mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (emp_idx, type, content, date) VALUES (#{emp_idx}, #{type}, #{content}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT d.emp_idx AS writerEmpIdx, MAX(CASE WHEN a.approv_order = 1 THEN a.emp_idx ELSE NULL END) AS firstApproverEmpIdx, MAX(CASE WHEN a.approv_order = 2 THEN a.emp_idx ELSE NULL END) AS secondApproverEmpIdx FROM document d LEFT JOIN approv a ON d.doc_idx = a.doc_idx WHERE d.doc_idx = #{docIdx}
